text: Falao shuo:“Zai wo yunxu nimen zhiqian, nimen jiu xinfeng tale ma? Ta biding shi nimen de touzi, ta ba moshu chuanshou gei nimen, suoyi wo shi bi jiaohuzhe kan diao nimen de shou he jiao, wo shi bi ba nimen ding si zai ye zao shu shang, nimen biding zhidao wo lia shei de xingfa geng yanli, geng changjiu.”
